TITLE: Episode 156 - The Narcissist in the Mirror with Ben Taylor [Some Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: [Small handful of hard curse words here and there] This week, we are joined by Ben Taylor of Raw Motivations. Ben is a self-aware narcissist on a journey of healing and growth. He's bringing awareness to narcissistic abuse and how it has affected his life and others. He works daily with Narcissistic Abuse Survivors to find healing and freedom from trauma. He also interacts with Narcissists to try to wake them up and help them change. Join us as we examine the life and mind of a narcissist.
